chipp:data:files:upload.description: Upload multiple files based on a csv as standalone files or linked to records. The csv must have the following headers: Title, PathOnClient. The csv may have the following headers: FirstPublishLocationId. This utility uses the same setup as [Salesforce Dataloader for files](https://help.salesforce.com/articleView?id=000314772&type=1&mode=1).

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command
